Desc:
University College of London, Research Department of Epidemiology & Public Health, School of Medicine, PhD researcher in Epidemiology and Public health. Awarded with a full scholarship, CONICYT Becas Chile.
Dissertation title: Socioeconomic inequalities in the management of hypertension: Chilean National Health Surveys 2003, 2010 and 2017

Pontificia Universidad Católica de Chile, Department of Public Health, School of Medicine, Master’s degree in Epidemiology. August 2014. Scholarship from the Pontificia Universidad Católica de Chile. Rank: N° 1 out of 9 graduates. Dissertation title: Blood pressure control among the treated hypertensive population: Chilean National Health Survey 2010
Pontificia Universidad Católica de Chile, Department of Pharmacy, School of Chemistry, Degree of Chemist and Pharmacist. May 2011, rank: N° 2 out of 65 graduates.
